name: Send a Slack message for every new ManyChat webhook event
description: Streamline your communication process by integrating ManyChat with Slack. This template ensures that every time a webhook is triggered in ManyChat, a corresponding message is automatically created in your Slack channel. Enhance your team's collaboration and responsiveness by keeping everyone informed in real-time, without the need for manual updates. Perfect for businesses looking to improve their customer engagement and internal communication efficiency.
